markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Masked Casting](/Feats.aspx?ID=1083) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 85 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Hellknight Signifer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=26)

**Prerequisites**
[Hellknight Signifer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1082)

**Trigger**
You begin Casting a Spell.

**Requirements**
You are wearing your signifer’s mask.

</column>

---

You harness the magical energy flowing through your eyeless mask to effortlessly protect you from visual effects. You [Avert your Gaze](/Actions.aspx?ID=92).
name: Masked Casting
requirement: You are wearing your signifer’s mask.
requirement_markdown: You are wearing your signifer’s mask.
